channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.description:
Apr 7, 02:20 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/04/2022 01:45 UTC
End Time : 07/04/2022 01:45 UTC

The equipment is still OK. We close the incident.

Apr 7, 02:07 UTC

We will keep it under surveillance for a few minutes to confirm that the incident has been resolved.

Apr 7, 01:57 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/04/2022 01:45 UTC
Service impact : Vrack network not available on rack 54B15
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently determining the source of the problem.

item.title: [BHS5][Public network] - T05G09 -T05G28 - T05G30 - T05G34 - T05G35 - T05G37 - T05G39 - T05H02 - T05H03 - T05H04 - T05H05 - T05H06 - T05H07 - T05H09 - T05H10 - T05H11 - T05H26 - T05H28
item.description:
Apr 7, 08:17 UTC
Update - The intervention has begun.
The rack T05H09 has lost its public network at 08h08 UTC.
We will post a new update once the intervention is finished

Apr 7, 08:00 UTC
Update - We will replace a second part of the hardware on the switch.
We expect a loss of the public network of servers present in the rack T05H09 during the intervention. We apologize for the inconvenience caused

Apr 7, 07:03 UTC
Monitoring - The material is changed, our teams are monitoring the situation.

Apr 7, 06:59 UTC
Update - Rack T05H07 is reachable since 06h50 UTC.

Apr 7, 06:36 UTC
Update - We observe a loss of public connectivity on the T05H07 rack.

Apr 7, 06:12 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams will proceed to an hardware replacement on switch A.
We will publish a new update once the replacement is done

Apr 6, 13:52 UTC
Update - Currently, the traffic is ensured by the switches B and A. However, the redundancy is not ensured if B became unreachable. Indeed, only 90% of the traffic would be provided by A.This is due to a hardware issue which is being repaired by one of our manufacturers.

Apr 6, 10:15 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 06/04/2022 07:15 UTC
Service impact : After the operations carried out by our team, all the services are now operational. The switch is working as expected at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation for another 2 hours.

Apr 6, 08:15 UTC
Identified - Start time : 06/04/2022 07:15 UTC
Service impact : After the resolution of this incident Incident link, We observed problems with one of the switches that was set up to restore services. During the reload, we except some loss of services.
Ongoing actions : our technical teams will proceed to its isolation, we plan to perform a reload afterwards to fix the problem.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 45D24
item.description:
Apr 6, 03:41 UTC

Mar 18, 01:09 UTC

End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

item.title: [BHS5][Public network] - T05G09 -T05G28 - T05G30 - T05G34 - T05G35 - T05G37 - T05G39 - T05H02 - T05H03 - T05H04 - T05H05 - T05H06 - T05H07 - T05H09 - T05H10 - T05H11 - T05H26 - T05H28
item.description:
Apr 5, 21:38 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/04/2022 13:41 UTC
End Time : 05/04/2022 18:32 UTC
Service impact : All the IPs are now operational. . The switches are working as expected at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation for another 3 hours.
Root cause : There was a VPC (virtual port channel) issue between the switches A and B

Apr 5, 19:12 UTC
Update - Start Time : 05/04/2022 13:41 UTC
End Time : 05/04/2022 18:32 UTC
Service impact : All the IPs are now operational. . The switches are working as expected at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation for another 3 hours.
Root cause : There was a VPC (virtual port channel) issue between the switches A and B

Apr 5, 18:34 UTC
Update - Actually, for the 2 switches A and B, 2535 out of 2604 IPs are operational.

Apr 5, 18:27 UTC
Update - The services were interrupted again between 18h00 utc and 18h14. switch B is operational again. we are going to carry out manual operations on switch A

Apr 5, 17:46 UTC
